base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with a modern design.
part_description: Features three top compartments and one large bottom door. The compartments are evenly spaced, and the door covers the lower half, hinged on the right side.
internal_interaction_description: The top compartments are open and separated by vertical dividers, providing distinct storage areas. The bottom door swings open to reveal a larger storage space, utilizing hinges for smooth operation. The design allows for organized storage within the cabinet.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall for stability. Users can store items in the top compartments for easy access, while the bottom door allows access to larger items. It interacts with the environment by organizing space efficiently.
